product_name: Imagine Surf Icon GC Stand Up Paddle Board - 11'
long_description: The Icon boosts confidence for flatwater paddling with its generous volume and width that beefs up stability. It also has a progressive rocker and thinned out nose and tail for charging the surf.
short_description: The Icon boosts confidence for flatwater paddling with its generous volume and width that beefs up stability. It also has a progressive rocker and thinned out nose and tail for charging the surf.
